text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Woah, I didn't realize there was such a beautiful beach near our lodging♪ It reminds me of the beaches near my hometown in Tomakomai!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: And so there you have it. Having flown in on the wings of a paper bird, this is Tomakomai's oyster-loving local idol, Hokko Tarumae signing off! Bye bye!
(……pchon♪)

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: That was perfect! You looked so adorable! I could really feel your love for Tomakomai! No wonder they consider you to be their ambassador!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: R-Really!? That's great to hear…! Oh, but… if you have any advice or recommendations please let me know!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hmm, let me think… Oh, how about trying Umasta? It could help you feel more down to earth!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Tarumae-chan, with Umasta you'd be able to show them what your daily life is like! I'm sure they'd love to see that.

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Ohoho, well if you're trying to be more down to earth… Why not try using your Hokkaido dialect more often? After all, that's a very important part of your daily life, right?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: No! There's no way I could do that! My image is that of a pure, fluffy, and cute local idol!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: So… Sorry, but I don't think I can show them the real me. I'd rather show them my real local idol self…!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Don't worry, I get it! Keeping your image intact is important! But your real local idol self, huh? What's the best way to do that…?

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Ohoho… Ummster seems pretty difficult…

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: It's called Umasta, Acute-san.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Tarumae, why not try a different venue? There's a strong feeling of ill intent directed at you here!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: So why not try that building over there! It's in the same direction that your life energy is going, so it should help to bring good luck in your career and fortune!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: There's way too many people over there, I won't be able to concentrate on the shoot. But… are you concerned about the Feng Shui of this place? I don't really care about those things.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Really? You do know that Feng Shui is a well researched field of "environmental luck science", right!? After all, our environment and the colors we see do have an influence on the way we think, so how is this any different?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: I don't care about that, so I'm staying here! After all, I'm able to control the way that I think without any influence!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Anyways, we weren't even talking about that. We were trying to help me convey my local idol self. What about doing… umm…

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: I guess Mooster really is out of the question…

text_block_list.name: Tarumae & Rickey
text_block_list.text: We told you that it's called Umasta! It's called Umasta, silly.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Lightbulb!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Wh-What's gotten into you Falco-san?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: If we have the laid back Acute-san, the pragmatic Tarumae-chan, and the eccentric Ricky-san…

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: We could make a group of 3 to help gain more support! How does that sound!?

text_block_list.name: Tarumae, Acute & Rickey
text_block_list.text: Gain more support…? No way no way!

text_block_list.name: Assistant Director
text_block_list.text: Okay, we're going to be rolling soon! Tokai Teio-san, tell us how it tastes in 3, 2…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Mmm! It's so tasty and refreshing! I wish they sold it on campus!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I heard that a lot of students use these trails on their morning runs! The air here is refreshing and it's a nice change of pace from running near the city!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I might as well take this opportunity to go for a run! Plus I bet you guys want a shot of me running anyways, right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So that's why you should all come to our upcoming live performance! Hmm…? Why do you all look so dumbfounded?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Waaah!?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hey, isn't that… Machan?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, I think you're right? Hold on, wait a second… isn't she standing in the shot!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wait, when did you get behind me!? Hold on… have you been following me the entire time!? Why would you do that!?

text_block_list.name: Aston Machan
text_block_list.text: Tehehe… Don't mind me…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: No, there's no way I couldn't mind!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I'm very sorry! It seems like one of our students is annoying you all! Machan, you can't just enter other people's shots! Come on, let's go.

text_block_list.name: Aston Machan
text_block_list.text: Oh, I didn't know that… Okay everyone, that's all from Machan for today.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Don't feel down, Machan, in exchange I'll take a bunch of pictures of you over there.

text_block_list.name: Aston Machan
text_block_list.text: Pictures!? I love that idea. Okay everyone, please remember your lovely Maa-chan!

text_block_list.name: Aston Machan
text_block_list.text: Remember me tomorrow, the next day, and the following 100 years too! After all, I'll always be there in the corner of your heart. See you all later!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: O-Oi! If you don't hurry up, Miss Perfect Student is gonna be upset…!

text_block_list.name: Aston Machan
text_block_list.text: Okay… remember Aston Machan! I'll see you all again!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Haa… Jeez…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa & Vodka
text_block_list.text: Come on already!
